introduction: I want to stay here like this today.21 year-old reckless Hyeon-jeong comes home from a date with audacious plutocrat Dong-soo after a fight. Her father pressures her to work at his friend Dal-goo’s camping site.One day Dal-goo saves Hyeon-jeong from almost being harassed by local gangsters and Hyeon-jeong starts feeling funny for him ever since then. Meanwhile, Hyeon-jeong’s friend Mi-sook is jealous of Hyeon-jeong and while she’s working, Mi-sook seduces Dong-soo. However, misfortune comes to Hyeon-jeong.
